resources.string: \nFix Google Tasks sync. \nFix bug which would delete all notes during Google Tasks sync.
\nNew setting: enable/disable first line in notes to be bigger font. \nReminders: Now default to today instead of tomorrow.
\nFixed possible crash when Google account is removed from device.

Fixed bug when multiple items were moved/deleted, syncing with SD-card could recreate them. 
Fixed bug where renaming a list or moving tasks would not update the list in side navigation bar. 
App is now back on F-Droid and can be built without proprietary parts.
\nFixed bug with multiple widget where the plus icon would always add notes to the last configured list \nTranslations
\nRemoved ability to donate and unlocked themes for everyone \nTranslations
\nNew Sync option: Dropbox \nNew Sync option: SD-card

Export and Import your notes to a text backup 
Changed date and time pickers 
Translations
\nCalendars now scrollable on small screens again \nTranslations

Fixed clicking on links 
Added text options for list 
Added text options for editor 
Adjusted single line display to only show titles 
Fixed the widget plus button when showing all 
Added search field for location reminders, which remembers your previous locations 
Fixed bug which could clear all items on sync 
Implemented pull-to-refresh 
Tweaked editor layout, especially the display of notifications 
Removed time from due date 
Keyboard should now appear correctly for new notes 
Sharing: Now consistent with how what other apps share 
Some various layout tweaks 
Translations 
Crash fixes

UI has been updated

Location reminders
